title: [HOLD for payment 2024-11-01] [$250] Search - Selection persists after the expense is deleted and no expense is selected
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Submit an expense to any user.
3. Go to Search.
4. Select the submitted expense via checkbox.
5. Go back to Inbox.
6. Delete the expense in Step 2.
7. Go to Search.

Expected result: The selection should reset because the expense is deleted.

Actual result: None
